ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] silly questions from an old timer
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Glad to see ya back.  course, that s demoralizing in any game... ... Nope.  But really, it s just annoying.  Ignore it, and keeping your old timing should
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:57 AM 1/4/2002 -0500, you wrote:
>Well, I took a break from eq when daoc came out, and honestly love daoc, but
>dying 3 times in a row at 30+ hurts like hell and is pretty demoralizing,
>and well I kinda missed my eq guild (people are less chatty in daoc). So I
>reactivated my account last night and am back in eq...


Glad to see ya back. 'course, that's demoralizing in any game...

>Question for the lot of ya:
>
>Is there any way to disable the song timer?

Nope. But really, it's just annoying. Ignore it, and keeping your old
timing should work.

Talies
